title: [Large-scale] Academic Stress Management and Self-directed Learning Competency Enhancement for Nursing Students

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge in nursing education or adult education, with foundational understanding of research methodologies
context.additional_context: Participants are general citizens with practical experience in nursing or education, aiming to build a talent pool capable of mentoring in local communities post-training

learning_goals: Learners can present at least three stress management strategies applicable to real life by analyzing the correlation between academic stress and resilience
Students can create a self-directed learning plan using academic motivation enhancement techniques and revise it through peer feedback.
Through PBL team projects, students can analyze real-world cases in nursing education and develop a report on resilience enhancement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
